pageTitle: Economic hotel PORTO ALEGRE - ibis Porto Alegre Aeroporto
textBeforeTable: Opening hours : 19:00 - 22:30 Type of cuisine : International Air conditioning LA TABLE Catering of the ibis Porto Alegre Aeroporto hotel Start your day well! The breakfast buffet of ibis hotels has delicious options for all tastes, including breads, cookies, cold cut, cereals, fruits, cakes, jams, honey, yogurt, juices, scrambled eggs, milk, coffee, tea and chocolate.
